  • Method Details

    • moveCurrentPlayerToSpace

      public void moveCurrentPlayerToSpace(@NotNull Space space, boolean backupflag)
      Moves current player to space if possible

      Moves current player to the parsed space if the space is empty TODO If the field is occupied, push the the player

    • startProgrammingPhase

      public void startProgrammingPhase()
      Start programming phase

      Sets the current phase to programming phase and sets current player and step index to 0 Removes all the cards in the command card fields and replaces them with new, random command cards

    • finishProgrammingPhase

      public void finishProgrammingPhase()
      Finish programming phase and start activation phase

      Finished programming phase by locking the progam fields and makes the programmed card invisble except for the card in register 0. Afterwards changes the game phase to acivation phase and sets the current player and step to index 0

    • executePrograms

      public void executePrograms()
      Disables step mode and executes the programs

      Disables step mode and runs the programs programmed by the player.

    • executeStep

      public void executeStep()
      Executes the next step

      Execute the card in the current step for the current player and doesn't continue execution afterwards.

    • executeBoardElement

      public void executeBoardElement(Player player)

    • moveForward

      public void moveForward(@NotNull Player player)
      Moves the player one spaces forward

      This method moves the player one spaces forward, if the target space is valid.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will be moved.

    • moveBoardElement

      public void moveBoardElement(@NotNull Player player, FieldObject fieldObject)

    • fastForward

      public void fastForward(@NotNull Player player, int moves)
      Moves the player two spaces forward

      This method moves the player two spaces forward

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will be moved.

    • turnRight

      public void turnRight(@NotNull Player player)
      Turns the player right.

      This method rotates the 90 degrees right, relative to the players heading.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will be rotated.

    • turnLeft

      public void turnLeft(@NotNull Player player)
      Turns the player left.

      This method rotates the 90 degrees left, relative to the players heading.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will be rotated.

    • uturn

      public void uturn(@NotNull Player player)
      Turns the player to the opposition direction.

      This method rotates the player 180 degrees.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will be rotated.

    • powerup

      public void powerup(@NotNull Player player)
      Adds one energy to the player's energy balance

      This method adds one energy to the player's energy balance

      Parameters:
      player - the player which energy balance will be increased with one.

    • backup

      public void backup(@NotNull Player player)
      Moves the player one slot back.

      This method executes moves the player one position in the opposite the direction, that the player is facing. If the destination space is not valid, the player will not move.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will move one space back.

    • again

      public void again(@NotNull Player player)
      Repeats last command card

      This method executes the players last used command card. If there was no program field before the current field, no card will execute.

      Parameters:
      player - the player which will repeat and execute the last card

    • moveCards

      public boolean moveCards(@NotNull CommandCardField source, @NotNull CommandCardField target)
      Moves a card from one card field to another

      This method moves a card from a card field to an empty card field If the source card field is empty or the target card field occupied, the method will return false, indicating the move operation was invalid. The method will return true, if the card is moved successfully.

      Parameters:
      source - the source command card field
      target - the target command card field
      Returns:
      boolean, if the move operation was successful.

    • executeCommandOptionAndContinue

      public void executeCommandOptionAndContinue(Command command)
      Executes a command that is selected by the player and resumes execution afterwards.

      This method always executes the parsed command given by the command parameter. Afterwards the method continues execution of the rest of the registers by setting the phase to ACTIVATION_PHASE. The game continues execution with/without step mode as when the card interaction card was reached.

      Parameters:
      command - the player-chosen command
